nodes.documentation:
@title ERC20 token
 * @dev Implementation of the basic standard token.
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-20.md
Originally based on code by OpenZeppelin: https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-solidity/blob/master/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol
nodes.name: Likoin

nodes.documentation: Event for token conversion
nodes.name: TokensConversion

nodes.documentation: Event for an approval
nodes.name: Approval

nodes.documentation: @dev Transfer token to a specified address
nodes.name: transfer

nodes.documentation: @dev The way in which tokens are converted to bucks.
nodes.name: convertToBucks

nodes.documentation: @dev Approve the passed address to spend the specified amount of tokens on behalf of msg.sender.
nodes.name: approve

nodes.documentation: @dev Transfer tokens from one address to another if the address from approved msg.sender
nodes.name: transferFrom

nodes.documentation: @dev Increase the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.
nodes.name: increaseAllowance

nodes.documentation: @dev Decrease the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.
nodes.name: decreaseAllowance

nodes.documentation: @dev Transfer token for a specified addresses
nodes.name: _transfer

nodes.documentation:
@dev Internal function that mints an amount of the token and assigns it to
an account.
nodes.name: _mint

nodes.documentation: @dev Share value tokens between all addresses except from
nodes.name: _shareToken

nodes.documentation:
@dev Internal function that burns an amount of the token of a given
account.
nodes.name: _burn

nodes.documentation:
@dev Internal function that burns an amount of the token of a given
account, deducting from the sender's allowance for said account.
nodes.name: _burnFrom

nodes.documentation: @dev Internal function that adds an holder
nodes.name: _addHolder

nodes.documentation: @dev Internal function that removes an holder
nodes.name: _removeHolder

nodes.documentation: @return the token being used for conversion.
nodes.name: buck

nodes.documentation: @return the number of buck units a buyer gets per token.
nodes.name: conversionRate

nodes.documentation: @dev Gets the balance of the specified address.
nodes.name: balanceOf

nodes.documentation: @dev Function to check the amount of tokens that an owner allowed to a spender.
nodes.name: allowance

nodes.documentation: @dev Function that returns the balanceHolders length
nodes.name: getBalanceHoldersLength

nodes.documentation: @dev Function that returns the address in position i of balanceHolders
nodes.name: getBalanceHolder
